verbose_text: All patients analysed for connexin cell surface expression were classified according to the FAB criteria and this morphological / histochemical classification was used to group the patients into two major subsets as follows : i) AML cells showing no or minimal signs of differentiation (FAB classification M0, M1 and M2); and ii) signs of monocytic differentiation (FAB M4 and M5) (XREF_FIG).
